page.title: 07NW.SHERBORNE:RETAIL DELIVERY
page.content: There are no shops in the{rural parts so a delivery service is important. { {Milkman}- delivers daily except Sundays. As well as milk he will supply eggs, cheese, butter, cream, bread and fizzy drinks. It is necessary to order most food in advance. {Ice-cream}- van visits periodically in the summer months. {Baker}- three times a week with locally baked bread. {Grocer}- weekly, also sells fruit and vegetables. {Library van}- visits rural areas fortnightly. {Refuse collection}- the rubbish is collected once a week. Dustbins are left out in the road for the dustmen. {Newspapers}- delivered by car in the rural areas, by bicycle or foot (usually by teen-agers) in Sherborne.
